title: Pricing model management
subtitle: Pricing model can be attached to one or multiple clients.

view.tooltip: Inspect the associated rule and client details

setToDefault.tooltip: Set this pricing model as default

error.onUpdateDefaultPricingModel: Unable to update default pricing model. Try later or reach out to CIDgravity team.
error.onDeletePricingModel: Unable to delete pricing model. Try later or reach out to CIDgravity team

empty.title: There are no pricing models under your account. A default pricing model must be created to use CIDgravity.

error.generic: Unable to load pricing models. Try later or reach out to CIDgravity team.
